articleHeader.title: How to manage layout in a design system
articleHeader.subTitle: Two way's of doing it well.
articleHeader.intro: A design system is a collection of components. Each component solves a different problem and each has a list of rules on when and how it should be used. A component is also not aware of its surroundings, therefor it doesn't matter, for the component, where you place it on the page. It should always work.
